item.title: Golang Env from Scratch
item.description: This guide will help you install Golang and some useful developer tools in your fresh OS X instance. And there is a Hello World example at the end! Installations include: Homebrew Golang Zsh (with Oh My Zsh) Terminal.app Options Visual Studio Code (with plugins) Installation Find and open the Terminal app in OS X. Run these commands. (The code blocks below will have comments in them which start with a # but you should be able to copy and paste the whole code block into the Terminal.
